pullRequest.title: HDDS-3273. getConf does not return all OM addresses.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Added a new utility method to return a list of addresses keyed by serviceId.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3273
How was this patch tested?
Added a unit test and verified via docker:
bash-4.2$ /opt/hadoop/bin/ozone getconf -ozonemanagers
{omservice=[om1/172.22.0.6:9862, om2/172.22.0.4:9862, om3/172.22.0.2:9862]}
bash-4.2$ /opt/hadoop/bin/ozone getconf -ozonemanagers
om

commit.message: HDDS-3273. getConf does not return all OM addresses.

nodes.bodyText: One minor comment. when for one of nodeId address is undefined, do we want to print "unknown address" instead of silently ignoring?

commit.message: Log error message if address undefined.
